remarks: Closure of dual subspace sum for the map defined by ~ df-mapd . (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdlsmcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdlsmcl.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdlsmcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdlsmcl.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdlsmcl.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` C ) $.
mapdlsmcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdlsmcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran M ) $.
mapdlsmcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran M ) $.
mapdlsmcl $p |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) Y ) e. ran M ) $.
